Field Label: Record ID

FertiQoL International

Fertility Quality of Life Questionnaire (2008)
For each question, kindly check (tick the box) for the response that most closely reflects how you think and feel.
Relate your answers to your current thoughts and feelings. Some questions may relate to your private life, but they are necessary to adequately measure all aspects of your life.
Please complete the items marked with an asterisk (*) only if you have a partner.

Section Header: For each question, check the response that is closest to your current thoughts and feelings.
Field Label: How would you rate your health?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Very Poor | 2, Poor | 3, Neither Good nor Poor | 4, Good | 5, Very Good

Section Header: For each question, check the response that is closest to your current thoughts and feelings
Field Label: Are you satisfied with your quality of life?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Very Dissatisfied | 2, Dissatisfied | 3, Neither Satisfied Nor Dissatisfied | 4, Satisfied | 5, Very Satisfied
